entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
